author: travisjohn
title: Mint Home Equity as NFT
description: Many homeowners want to convert untapped equity to crypto, but their options are limited.
solution: Minting home equity as an NFT collateralizes the value onto the blockchain and unlocks the wide world of DeFi.
experience: I'm a tech-savvy entrepreneur, Cardano SPO, and active real estate broker with experience as a loan officer and title & escrow company owner
